input_text:
Job Title: Senior Engineer, Electrical

Location: Boise, ID

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
Your vision is ambitious. Just like ours. 

Our people are our success. As one of us, you will contribute to engineering excellence for the high-tech markets of the future, including semiconductors, batteries, pharmaceuticals, biotechnology, and data centers. At Exyte, you will be part of a global community of challenge seekers who are ambitious and passionate about innovation. Together, we will build on our company’s long history and keep on leading the way to a better world.

Discover your exciting role

Non-Solicitation: We are not currently accepting third-party agency candidates for this position. Any agency candidate submitted to any employee of Exyte may be contacted by Exyte without obligation to the third-party agency.

The Senior Engineer, Electrical participates in a team environment consisting of engineers and designers to produce construction documents for the following systems: power, lighting, controls, grounding, and the like.

Explore Your Tasks And Responsibilities

Performs engineering tasks for the design of electrical systems for high technology facilities including cleanrooms, general manufacturing/process facilities and institutional facilities Prepares electrical engineering calculations in support of electrical system designs including, electrical equipment sizing, feeder sizing and equipment selection Coordinates with disciplines in the preparation and development of the deliverables and ensuring those other disciplines’ inputs are incorporated Provides specialized technical input to studies and design for staff’s specific area of expertise Supports project on-site execution and make decisions to support projects and act as technical consultant Provides specialized technical input to studies and design for staff’s specific area of expertise Assists in developing studies and design procedures to facilitate high quality cost effective work by discipline team Coordinates with the project team and other disciplines as well as other design offices Assists in the development of conceptual design, preliminary design and final design documents which would include calculations related to sizing and selecting of these systems, the development of power diagrams, layout of electric equipment, electrical system control and the like Other duties as assigned 

The information contained in this job description is intended to describe the essential job functions required of those assigned to this job. It is not intended to be an exhaustive list of all responsibilities, duties, knowledge, skills, and abilities needed to perform the job. Please note that management retains the right to assign or reassign duties and responsibilities to this job at any time. The ability to competently perform all the essential duties of the position, with or without reasonable accommodation, demonstrated commitment to effective customer service delivery, integrity, and the ability to work productively as a member of a team or work group are basic requirements of all positions at Exyte Group.

Show Your Expertise

6+ years of experience Bachelor’s degree in Electrical Engineering required Knowledge of codes and common industry standards related to the design of industrial and manufacturing facilities and systems Good time management skills, strong work ethic and attention to details Good verbal and written communication skills Must be a strong team player with an ability to build effective working relationships with individuals, department leads, and client representatives Energetic and self-motivated Works to build and maintain positive and productive working relationships both internal and external Ability to mentor and train junior staff Passed Fundamentals of Engineering (FE) Exam preferred Nation Council of Examiners for Engineering and Surveying (NCEES) Record preferred

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level

Assists in the development of design documents
Performs calculations related to sizing and selecting systems
